headline: Vertex Pain Setback Prompts Fund Exit And Recheck Of Valuation Gap
summary: Vertex Pharmaceuticals (NasdaqGS:VRTX) is reassessing its pain management program after disappointing FDA label discussions for Journavx. Phase II data for pain candidate VX-993 did not meet expectations for use as a standalone therapy. Hardman Johnston Global Equity Strategy has exited its position in the company following these developments. The company has decided not to pursue VX-993 as a monotherapy, which signals a shift in how its non cystic fibrosis assets are being viewed. Vertex...
